hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | { read file_path; if [ -n "$file_path" ]; then case "$file_path" in */skills/*/SKILL.md) if [ -f "$file_path" ] && ! head -1 "$file_path" | grep -q '^---'; then echo 'BLOCKED: SKILL.md files require YAML frontmatter (---) with name and description fields' >&2; exit 2; fi ;; esac; fi; }

jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | { read file_path; if [ -n "$file_path" ]; then case "$file_path" in */agents/*.md|*/skills/*/SKILL.md|*/commands/*.md|*/hooks/*.json) echo "$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ) MODIFIED $file_path" >> /tmp/proagent-ae-audit.log ;; esac; fi; }

if [ -f .claude-plugin/plugin.json ] || [ -d .claude/agents ] || [ -d .claude/skills ]; then echo '[proagent-agentic-engineering] Agentic engineering plugin loaded. Use /proagent-agentic-engineering for capabilities.'; fi
